title: Renovated Top-Floor 1+ Bed Condo w/ Large Deck, Pets OK - NOVEMBER 1!
posting_body: ['Video walkthrough: https://youtu.be/jQLqihbXPgc', 'Updated, top-floor condo-quality 1 bed + office in ideal Jeffries Point location on Sumner St. is available for NOVEMBER 1!', ' Your new apartment is just steps to Piers Park, the Greenway, and great dining options such as The Quiet Few and Cunard Tavern.', ' Of course, the MBTA Blue Line at Maverick Sq is only 1/4 mi away.', ' The unit features:', '- Renovated eat-in kitchen w/ granite countertops and stainless steel appliances (including dishwasher, gas stove, and microwave)', '- Updated bathroom w/ tile shower', '- Large bedroom and additional office space', '- New electrical work and recently home run re-wired for Fios!', '- HUGE private deck', '- Laundry facilities on-site (ask broker for details)', '- Easy street parking w/ permit', '- Pets subject to owner approval', 'Broker is very familiar with area, and happy to answer any questions you may have!', 'Please note:', '- 1 month broker fee applies', '- Max 2 tenants, applicants must be qualified based on income, credit, and references', '- Tenants responsible for gas and electric']
